attributes.action: Increase the enforcement powers of the Office of Fair Trading to eradicate poor professional standards in the Debt collection industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to maintain the requirements set out with regard Consumer credit Act 1974.
We require immediate and determined enforcement of the law to stop debt traders breaching regulations designed to protect the consumer.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FairTrade/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
